text: Wu Qingyuan (;His original name was Wu Quan. A new name, Qing Yuan was created for him based on his old name ("Quan" means spring, fountain and "Qing Yuan" means clear and pure source of water). June 12, 1914 â€“ November 30, 2014), also known as Go Seigen, was a Japanese Go player. He was thought by many other Go players as one of the greatest Go players in its history. Seigen turned 100 in June 2014. Seigen was born in Fuzhou, Fujian, China. Seigen died in Odawara, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan from natural causes, aged 100. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Chinese sportspeople Category:Japanese Go players Category:Japanese centenarians Category:People from Fujian
title: Go Seigen
